page.title: 07Childhood Memories (Cont.)
page.content: given a cup of cocoa at lunch time and after lunch they would play in the playground.Girls in the front playground,boys in the back.One day a girl fell off the wall which runs around the playground and so they put railings up which are still there.The Vicar would come to talk to the children some days but the best time was in the Summer.Then they had their sports' day.It was held in the field and the vicar and his curate would stand each side of the gate and throw nuts for the children and two teachers would have great baskets and give each child a bun and an orange to go home.During the two week Summer holiday would be the Culmstock Flower Show where there would be roundabouts and horses that went up and down and Mrs.Symons bought her first tomato for a penny but she thought it was a plum.
